::Demise::

Demise grunts, sitting down on a char and having it promptly break under him. He remains seated on the broken pieces.

"Yes. Battle's better than boredom, though."

He yawns, a piece of Flesh Ripper's outer armor falling out of his mouth. He then looks at Starscream. "You with Darkfate?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Starscream:::
> 
> Starscream: I know what you're talking about.  It's been awhile since i got 
> any action. Still, it's better than the days when we were constantly 
> bombarded by those idiot Maximals. You in Killfest's group?
